Plot: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.
Title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
Writer: Karey Kirkpatrick (screenplay), David Berenbaum (screenplay), John Sayles (screenplay), Tony DiTerlizzi (books), Holly Black (books)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Mary-Louise Parker, Nick Nolte, Sarah Bolger
tomatoConsensus: The Spiderwick Chronicles is an entertaining children's adventure, with heart and imagination to spare.
